title: Our Holistic Experiences — LIGHT PORTAL CEREMONY
author: Jose Jimenez
cleaned_text: RETREAT EXPERIENCES [ KAMBO CEREMONY ](/experiences/kambo-tulum) Experience Kambo medicine, an ancient healing ritual to cleanse the body and spirit of toxins. Once the physical and emotional burden is cleared, step into the plant medicine ceremony for a deeper spiritual journey. [Read More](/experiences/kambo-tulum) [ LIGHT PORTAL CEREMONIES ](/experiences/lightportal-ceremony) This powerful energetic healing ceremony incorporates body work, energy work, and sound healing. Working in harmony, these elements remove blockages and help you connect with your higher self. [Read More](/experiences/lightportal-ceremony) [ COSMIC SOUND HEALING ](/experiences/cosmic-soundhealing) Delight yourselves under the frequencies of Swami's
